name: SodiumLabTestCapillaryMolesPerVolume
title: Sodium Lab Test Capillary Moles Per Volume
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab tests commonly used for a capillary sodium test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a capillary sodium lab test performed. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to Laboratory Test, Result or Laboratory Test, Order datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Sodium lab test using the source of capillary blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Sodium lab tests using the source of blood/serum/plasma blood.)
